title: 4.4 Master Challenge 1
question:
Create a class named Customer with the following instance variables.
customerName, customerAddress, phoneNumber, and object for the CookieFactory class.

Note: Choose the appropriate access specifiers.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
